fields.summary: Update GitHub Actions workflow to use the latest versions of actions
fields.description: The current GitHub Actions workflows in the Hadoop repository are using outdated versions of GitHub Actions, such as {{{}actions/checkout@v3{}}}. To ensure better security, performance, and compatibility, we should update them to the latest stable versions.
